81369589-2e70-4fc8-aca3-0cc303c912dc.name: Levitation
81369589-2e70-4fc8-aca3-0cc303c912dc.notes: Telekinesis ability. You can pick yourself up and fly.

d41f8683-15ce-4a31-832a-6e08a44ac16a.name: Flight
d41f8683-15ce-4a31-832a-6e08a44ac16a.notes: Air Move is Basic Speed x 2 (drop all fractions)

420522b9-9389-4ac9-abee-c4022ba3aa98.name: Diffuse
420522b9-9389-4ac9-abee-c4022ba3aa98.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

8d092bdb-4e27-4ac4-af09-cbfa21a834fe.name: Homogenous
8d092bdb-4e27-4ac4-af09-cbfa21a834fe.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

c1403c0d-6ddd-4b59-a3e0-c45995634c43.name: No Blood
c1403c0d-6ddd-4b59-a3e0-c45995634c43.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

60eed9f4-902d-417c-afcb-52e8135bd966.name: No Brain
60eed9f4-902d-417c-afcb-52e8135bd966.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

bfc0449d-dc0c-4ef5-9463-c3c4e20ad171.name: No Eyes
bfc0449d-dc0c-4ef5-9463-c3c4e20ad171.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

894cf493-ef8e-40b4-8d4a-09a52bbaf68f.name: No Head
894cf493-ef8e-40b4-8d4a-09a52bbaf68f.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

7edfca0a-8904-4c4c-af41-eba33c1083d0.name: No Neck
7edfca0a-8904-4c4c-af41-eba33c1083d0.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

a30df1b1-55d6-4fa5-a51d-bc49737d8dd3.name: No Vitals
a30df1b1-55d6-4fa5-a51d-bc49737d8dd3.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

a36e1127-8411-4823-a3c6-4f5f2c59fdfe.name: Unliving
a36e1127-8411-4823-a3c6-4f5f2c59fdfe.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5

199019e2-2e53-4cd0-a4ff-4d16c8a0b4be.name: Diffuse
199019e2-2e53-4cd0-a4ff-4d16c8a0b4be.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

de2e2324-ecee-4fb0-b6da-1b1f08fed553.name: Homogenous
de2e2324-ecee-4fb0-b6da-1b1f08fed553.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

4f021c92-3329-4f62-a448-1e7e328c413f.name: No Blood
4f021c92-3329-4f62-a448-1e7e328c413f.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

779064ab-043c-4113-9870-4040b7e0b68d.name: No Brain
779064ab-043c-4113-9870-4040b7e0b68d.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

74d4d37f-3a5c-4190-ac28-27595643e4c9.name: No Eyes
74d4d37f-3a5c-4190-ac28-27595643e4c9.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

d6979d68-33ee-4bd8-a400-b45cc5450ed3.name: No Head
d6979d68-33ee-4bd8-a400-b45cc5450ed3.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

f37ec802-769c-4adf-83a6-79d2ae8051fb.name: No Neck
f37ec802-769c-4adf-83a6-79d2ae8051fb.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

0eac06a2-31fc-470c-ba9f-fb22696cebde.name: No Vitals
0eac06a2-31fc-470c-ba9f-fb22696cebde.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

a143217e-434f-4ab3-8c2d-838051971306.name: Unliving
a143217e-434f-4ab3-8c2d-838051971306.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5

f46d54c5-0588-4d09-851d-3160c6221dbc.name: Directional
f46d54c5-0588-4d09-851d-3160c6221dbc.notes: @Direction: Back, Right, Left, Top or Underside@

dd91285e-6ddf-4287-97b8-84de923a5819.name: Tough Skin
dd91285e-6ddf-4287-97b8-84de923a5819.notes: Effects that just require skin contact or a scratch ignore this DR

355cb2ad-6c0f-447f-a419-1efa0a2d10aa.name: Partial (@Location, 1 level per -1 Per Hit Modifier, Torso is -10% thus level 1@)

c1a49181-cc43-455f-a504-9269c923c243.name: Combat Reflexes
c1a49181-cc43-455f-a504-9269c923c243.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

8797e614-251b-4e89-9d64-59a0b234d43b.name: Telereceive
8797e614-251b-4e89-9d64-59a0b234d43b.notes: Communication ability. You can read another person's thoughts.

61494256-1971-435a-a4b0-5d46ed89ae70.name: Telesend
61494256-1971-435a-a4b0-5d46ed89ae70.notes: Communication ability. You can read project your thoughts into another's mind.

f855362e-0960-44a5-ad2b-f380d3848f86.name: Impulsiveness
f855362e-0960-44a5-ad2b-f380d3848f86.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to wait and ponder. If you fail, you must act

4376deae-5d40-4007-8f87-416ebee3db8d.name: Curious
4376deae-5d40-4007-8f87-416ebee3db8d.notes: Make a self-control roll when presented with an interesting item or situation

0c83d97e-a263-46f1-bcc5-77dee16b18aa.name: Blindness
0c83d97e-a263-46f1-bcc5-77dee16b18aa.notes: -6 to all combat skills; cannot target hit locations

97db3cc1-dec0-4e94-983d-d90bcc563396.name: Xenophobia (Strange and Unknown Things)
97db3cc1-dec0-4e94-983d-d90bcc563396.notes: You are upset by any sort of strange circumstances, and in particular by strange people. Make a self-control roll when surrounded by people of another race or nationality; roll at -3 if the people are not human. If you lose control, you might well attack strangers out of fear.
